title: You KNEW Something Wasn't Right
description:
Something is very wrong with corporate media. On my latest podcast I spoke with Batya Ungar-Sargon, author of “Bad News: How Woke Media Is Undermining Democracy” about the reasons corporate media doesn't represent ordinary people. 
#cnn #foxnews #msnbc

title: Oh This Looks Bad
description:
As it’s revealed that US prison workers produce $11bn worth of goods and services a year, and Joe Biden’s election pledge to reduce the prison population comes to nothing, have the powerful found another way to create a very profitable underclass? #biden #prisons #profits 

References
https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2022/jun/15/us-prison-workers-low-wages-exploited
https://www.motherjones.com/crime-justice/2021/07/biden-said-hed-cut-incarceration-in-half-so-far-the-federal-prison-population-is-growing/
https://theweek.com/criminal-justice-reform/1012829/this-is-not-the-major-criminal-justice-reform-biden-promised
